summary: This FBI 302 document records an investigation conducted on November 9, 2010, regarding the incarceration history of inmates Berry Kessler and Steven Hoffenberg. The investigation, involving a paralegal from the Federal Correctional Complex in Coleman, Florida, confirmed that Kessler and Hoffenberg were never housed in the same BOP facilities during their respective periods of incarceration.

persons.name: Berry Kessler
persons.context: Mentioned as an inmate with a BOP number whose incarceration records were reviewed to determine if he was ever housed in the same facility as Steven Hoffenberg.

persons.name: Steven Hoffenberg
persons.context: Mentioned as an inmate with a BOP number whose incarceration history was investigated to see if he was ever housed with Berry Kessler.

persons.name: Green
persons.context: Advised via phone call that inmates Berry Kessler and Steven Hoffenberg were never housed in the same BOP facilities during their incarcerations.

connections.description: The subject of an investigation to determine if they were ever incarcerated together in the same BOP facility.

events.title: Investigation into Incarceration History
events.description: Special Agent conducted an investigation, involving a phone call with BOP paralegal Green, to review BOP records and determine if inmates Berry Kessler and Steven Hoffenberg were ever housed together.

keyFacts: An investigation was conducted on November 9, 2010, regarding the incarceration of Berry Kessler and Steven Hoffenberg.
BOP paralegal Green advised that Kessler and Hoffenberg were never housed in the same BOP facilities during their respective periods of incarceration.
The inmate records for both individuals were obtained and placed in the case file.
